'''Lofty Tower's Flaming Brazier''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Lofty Tower's Flaming Brazier is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
